Package Game.Entities.Enemies

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
Game.Entities.Commons.Entity
Game.Entities.Enemies.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity, IBehaviour
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bomber, Gunner, Striker
public abstract class Enemy extends Entity
Abstract class that represents a generic enemy entity in the game. Handles health, state, weapons, animation, and collision logic.
